Class playn.core.Surface

Added interface react.Closeable.

Changed from an interface to a class. Changed from abstract to non-abstract.

Added Constructors
Surface(Graphics, RenderTarget, QuadBatch) Creates a surface which will render to {@code target} using {@code defaultBatch} as its default quad renderer.
 

Removed Methods
Surface drawImage(Image, float, float) Draws an image at the specified location.
Surface drawImage(Image, float, float, float, float) Draws a scaled or repeated image at the specified location.
Surface drawImage(Image, float, float, float, float, float, float, float, float) Draws a scaled subset of an image at the specified location.
Surface drawImageCentered(Image, float, float) Draws an image, centered at the specified location.
Surface drawLayer(Layer) Renders the supplied scene graph into this surface.
Surface fillTriangles(float[], float[], int, int, int[], int, int, int) Fills the supplied batch of triangles with the current fill pattern.
Surface fillTriangles(float[], float[], int[]) Fills the supplied batch of triangles with the current fill pattern.
Surface fillTriangles(float[], int, int, int[], int, int, int) Fills the supplied batch of triangles with the current fill color or pattern.
Surface fillTriangles(float[], int[]) Fills the supplied batch of triangles with the current fill color or pattern.
float height() Returns the height of this surface.
Surface restore() Restores the transform previously stored by .save().
Surface save() Saves the current transform.
Surface setShader(GLShader) Configures a custom shader to use when drawing images and shapes to this surface.
Surface setTransform(float, float, float, float, float, float) @deprecated You almost certainly do not want to do this because this will wipe out any pre-configured HiDPI transform and break automatic handling of HiDPI screens.
float width() Returns the width of this surface.
 

Added Methods
float alpha() Returns the currently configured alpha.
Surface begin() Starts a series of drawing commands to this surface.
Surface clear(float, float, float, float) Clears the entire surface to the specified color.
void close()  
int combineTint(int) Combines {@code tint} with the current tint via Tint.combine.
Surface concatenate(AffineTransform, float, float) Concatenates {@code xf} onto this surface's transform, accounting for the {@code origin}.
Surface draw(Tile, float, float) Draws a tile at the specified location: {@code x, y}.
Surface draw(Tile, float, float, float, float) Draws a tile at the specified location {@code (x, y)} and size {@code (w x h)}.
Surface draw(Tile, float, float, float, float, float, float, float, float) Draws a scaled subset of an image (defined by {@code (sx, sy)} and {@code (w x h)}) at the specified location {@code (dx, dy)} and size {@code (dw x dh)}.
Surface draw(Tile, int, float, float, float, float) Draws a tile at the specified location {@code (x, y)} and size {@code (w x h)}, with tint {@code tint}.
Surface draw(Tile, int, float, float, float, float, float, float, float, float) Draws a scaled subset of an image (defined by {@code (sx, sy)} and {@code (w x h)}) at the specified location {@code (dx, dy)} and size {@code (dw x dh)}, with tint {@code tint}.
Surface drawCentered(Tile, float, float) Draws a texture tile, centered at the specified location.
Surface drawLine(XY, XY, float) Fills a line between the specified coordinates, of the specified display unit width.
Surface end() Completes a series of drawing commands to this surface.
void endClipped() Ends a series of drawing commands that were clipped per a call to .startClipped.
boolean intersects(float, float, float, float) Returns whether the given rectangle intersects the render target area of this surface.
void popBatch(QuadBatch) Restores the batch that was in effect prior to a .pushBatch call.
Surface preConcatenate(AffineTransform) Pre-concatenates {@code xf} onto this surface's transform.
QuadBatch pushBatch(QuadBatch) Configures this surface to use {@code batch}, if non-null.
Surface restoreTx() Restores the transform previously stored by .saveTx.
Surface saveTx() Saves the current transform.
void setCheckIntersection(boolean) Configures this surface to check the bounds of drawn Tiles to ensure that they intersect our visible bounds before adding them to our GPU batch.
boolean startClipped(int, int, int, int) Starts a series of drawing commands that are clipped to the specified rectangle (in view coordinates, not OpenGL coordinates).
int tint() Returns the currently configured tint.
AffineTransform tx() Returns the current transform.
 

Changed Methods
Surface fillRect(float, float, float, float) Changed from abstract to non-abstract. Fills the specified rectangle.
Surface rotate(float) Changed from abstract to non-abstract. Rotates the current transformation matrix by the specified angle in radians.
Surface scale(float, float) Changed from abstract to non-abstract. Scales the current transformation matrix by the specified amount on each axis.
Surface setAlpha(float) Changed from abstract to non-abstract. Set the alpha component of this surface's current tint.
Surface setFillColor(int) Changed from abstract to non-abstract. Sets the color to be used for fill operations.
Surface setFillPattern(Texture) Change in signature from Pattern to Texture.
Changed from abstract to non-abstract. 		Sets the texture to be used for fill operations.
Surface setTint(int) Changed from abstract to non-abstract. Sets the tint to be applied to draw operations, as {@code ARGB}.
Surface transform(float, float, float, float, float, float) Changed from abstract to non-abstract. Multiplies the current transformation matrix by the given matrix.
Surface translate(float, float) Changed from abstract to non-abstract. Translates the current transformation matrix by the given amount.
Surface clear() Changed from abstract to non-abstract. Clears the entire surface to transparent blackness.
Surface drawLine(float, float, float, float, float) Changed from abstract to non-abstract. Fills a line between the specified coordinates, of the specified display unit width.
